high_descs: turn around and walk straight to the side of the bed
pick up the pillow furthest from you on the right
walk the pillow over the lamp on the nightstand
turn on the lamp while holding the pillow
anns.task_desc: get a pillow from the bed, take it to the nightstand and turn on the lamp

high_descs: take a step forward and turn to the left and go to the bed
pick up the far pillow from the bed
turn to the left and take a few steps and turn to the left and go to the dresser
turn on the lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine a pillow by the light of a dresser lamp

high_descs: Go to the bed that is on your left.
Pick up the nearest pillow on the right.
Turn around to your left and go to the dresser behind you.
Turn on the lamp on the left side of the dresser to look at the pillow.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow in the light of a lamp on a dresser.
